name: Cisco | IOS | Vendor | Cisco | IOS | Network | Load Balance | vserver Out of Service #2 (SYSLOG)
description: %CSM_SLB-6-RSERVERSTATE: Module 5 server state changed: SLB-NETMGT: ICMP health probe failed for server 10.20.220.10:80 in serverfarm 'WEBFARM'

patterns.value_re: %CSM_SLB-6-RSERVERSTATE: Module (?P<module>\d+) server state changed: SLB-NETMGT: .+ health probe failed for server (?P<name>.+?) in serverfarm '(?P<farm>.+)'
